effect.en: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Rapid Strike Pokémon in play.
effect.fr: Cette attaque inflige 30 dégâts pour chacun de vos Pokémon Mille Poings en jeu.
effect.es: Este ataque hace 30 puntos de daño por cada uno de tus Pokémon Golpe Fluido en juego.
effect.it: Questo attacco infligge 30 danni per ogni tuo Pokémon Colpo Rapido in gioco.
effect.pt: Este ataque causa 30 pontos de dano para cada um dos seus Pokémon Golpe Fluido em jogo.
effect.de: Diese Attacke fügt für jedes deiner Fließender-Angriff-Pokémon im Spiel 30 Schadenspunkte zu.

description.en: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in defeating foes by raining many blows down on them. Its strikes are nonstop, flowing like a river.
